author: Emily Angle
method: Pile all the veggies onto the bagel, season with salt and pepper and dot over the chilli sauce.
ingredients: 1 wholemeal or 50/50 thin bagel, sliced in half,  ½ small avocado (about 45g/ /1½oz), sliced,  4 radishes, thinly sliced,  2 slices tomato,  30g/1oz roasted red pepper from a jar (not in oil), drained, sliced,  small handful rocket,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  ¼ tsp chilli sauce
